Option.Title: How am I powering all this?
Wait, what's this moon base business?

DialogText: You must use oxygen collectors to gather oxygen. This is simple in the Overworld since there is oxygen everywhere. Just run the collector outside somewhere, feed it to a compressor, and fill your tanks. On the moon, it is certainly more difficult. I recommend this wheat farm here. It can be open to the outside elements. The collector will accumulate oxygen in an 11x11x11 cube around itself. Three layers of 7x7 wheat farms takes care of this volume. If you intend to build a larger base, you may not have to expand the farm. Just built more oxygen collectors. Route the oxygen into the base into an oxygen sealer. That will provide an atmosphere inside your base. You should also bring a spare collector to refill your tanks. All of this requires some electrical power, by the way.
